forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 51. West southwest wind 7 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 66. West wind 7 to 22 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight deepens in Downtown San Francisco, the evening brings with it a crispness that whispers of the impending night. The skies are mostly clear, adorned only with the faintest brush of lingering twilight hues. A gentle west-southwest wind weaves through the streets, rustling the leaves as it plays a soft serenade, with gusts occasionally rising to remind us of its presence. The temperature rests comfortably, cradling a coolness that feels refreshing against the skin, ideal for a relaxed evening meander.

Looking ahead to Sunday, the sun will rise with generous warmth, promising a glorious day bathed in golden light. The forecast hints at a high near 66, charmingly mild, while a continuous, moderate breeze will keep the air invigorating. As you step out, consider layering—as the morning reveals its brilliance, a light jacket or sweater will allow for comfort until the sun's embrace fully claims the day. This inviting weather beckons one to stroll through the neighborhoods, perhaps indulging in a late afternoon visit to a cozy café or simply wandering along the waterfront to take in the serene views, a delightful treat before the chaos of the week.
